stories.original_headline: Astronomers ring in the new year with a stunning galaxy collision
stories.original_summary: The Champagne Cluster is a rare and beautiful example of two galaxy clusters smashing together. stories.fantasy_headline: Stargazers Behold a Grand Celestial Dance!
stories.fantasy_story: On the eve of the Winter Solstice, the Celestial Scribes witnessed a wondrous event. Two great star-kingdoms, known as the Sparkling Constellation, performed a magnificent cosmic dance across the night sky. Fiery mists and countless stars swirled together in a dazzling spectacle, filling the observers with awe and wonder.

stories.original_headline: The deep ocean has a missing link and scientists finally found it
stories.original_summary: Scientists have uncovered why big predators like sharks spend so much time in the ocean’s twilight zone. stories.fantasy_headline: Deep Sea Wizards Unravel Abyss Secrets!
stories.fantasy_story: Marine Wizards have finally understood why the great leviathans dwell in the murky depths of the Sunken Realm. It seems smaller fish, called Twilight Dwellers, journey from the abyss to the surface each night, linking the Great Chain of Sustenance. Scholars used enchanted tracking gems to follow their mysterious paths.

stories.original_headline: Punkt’s German-made MC03 smartphone comes to the US this spring
stories.original_summary: Punkt, the Switzerland-based, privacy-focused phone maker, is trying the whole "smartphone" thing again. stories.fantasy_headline: New Scrying Mirror Arrives from the Iron Forges!
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Punkt Clan from the Alpine Holds is releasing a new version of their Whispering Device this spring. Crafted in the Northern Lands, this latest Scrying Mirror, the MC03, boasts improved enchantments for secretive communications. Users will pay a regular tribute of gold coins to maintain its powerful runes.
